column8: Is the body mass index <20.5 kg/m²?

name_nb: Har pasienten tapt vekt i løpet av de 3 siste månedene?
name_en: Has the patient lost weight in the previous 3 months?

name_nb: Har pasienten hatt redusert næringsinntak i den siste uken?
name_en: Was nutritional intake reduced in the previous week?
Is the patient very ill? (e.g. in intensive care)?
